name: Piranha Escape
description:
Piranha Escape is a 2D platformer game built for the PC. Colorful illustrations and relaxing audio will make an  amazing  underwater experience.

"Chi" is the main character in this game. She is diving underwater through bunch of deadly piranhas and trying to escape from those dangers.

Genre(s):  First-Person Survival; Escape Piranha
Controls:  Arrow Keys
Compatible Versions:  Windows
Audio:  Netherplace by Eric Matyas ( https://soundimage.org)

Install instructions
Unzip the zip and run the "Main Game" application

Future Developments
New update will be released on february 2019.
Update with more adventures and game levels.
